response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a unique blend of features but also embodies the essence of innovation and quality. Given its unparalleled value, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $12,000. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. I believe this investment would significantly enhance your experience and bring you unparalleled benefits. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to take advantage of this special offer.", "product_price": 12000}
